item.title: Create a Project Docs Site
item.description: It’s just as easy to create a Project-based docs site with Github Pages and Hugo. Following the guidance in my first post, there are just a few modifications we’ll need to make. The URL for your project will be https://<USERNAME|ORGANIZATION>.github.io/<PROJECT>/ In the root of your Github project run hugo new site . This will create the project scafflolding. Follow the same instructions for creating a Github-hosted Blog page: Adding a Github actions config file Add in a cool theme you Create some content to describe your project
